duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain excellent relationships with partners, carriers, and vendors.
Manage incoming email, mail, and calls from clients, lenders, and insurance company personnel.
Process policies as new business, renewals, or rewrites and maintain client profiles and policies in client management system.
Counsel clients on coverage and limits.
Assess when accounts need to be taken to market, quoted, and proposed.
Provide proactive risk management support in identifying, analyzing, and responding to a client’s needs.
Maintain and be responsible for expiration reports.
Review monthly statements from accounting and contact clients if late for agency bill policies.
Work efficiently and effectively in a team environment.
Apply problem-solving techniques to various issues that may arise from time to time with carriers and clients.
Utilize behaviors to work with various personalities and styles.
Pursue a program for professional development consistent with your position.

education_certification.credential: CISR designation or other advanced designation
